column3: the second time just wasn't as good as the first. Maybe it's the sandwich....The first time I had the famous Crunchy Chicken sandwich
column4: and it was DELICIOUS. I got some beans and the chips for the two sides. Chips = absolutely YUMMILICIOUS. Beans = just okay. I also got a cup of soup
column5: and it was amazing too. The second time I got the kale = just okay. And I had the potato egg salad
column6: and it was good at the first bite
column7: but then it became not so good after every bite. Haha. I'd still come here for the Crunchy Chicken sandwich. Oh
column8: the pretzel buns it comes on....oh so delicious. And get the chips. And get some soup if you want.
